personal-site.title: My Personal Website
personal-site.desc: I designed and implemented my own personal website (this one!) using React and other web tools.

la-cosecha-tortilla.title: La Cosecha Tortilleria Company Website
la-cosecha-tortilla.desc: I designed and implemented a website for the La Cosecha Tortilleria Company, a tortilla business located in Madison, WI.

JUST.title: Journal of Science and Technology (JUST)
JUST.desc: I helped maintain the website used by JUST, a club at UW-Madison.

NCJS.title: National Collegiate Journal of Science (NCJS)
NCJS.desc: I designed and implemented a WordPress website for the National Collegiate Journal of Science.

risk-assessment-and-aggregate-applicatio.title: Risk Assessment and Aggregate Application
risk-assessment-and-aggregate-applicatio.desc: Within my second summer with Northwestern Mutual, I and another intern created a prototype for a new way risk could be calculated and evaluated within the company.

liftoff.title: LiftOff
liftoff.desc: I, alongside 5 others, teamed up to create a web app called LiftOff, which was designed to streamline the onboarding experience for Northwestern Mutual interns.

apprisen-website-redesign.title: Apprisen Website Redesign (JP Morgan Chase Hackathon)
apprisen-website-redesign.desc: I was in team within JP Morgan Chase's Code For Good Hackathon where we redesigned a website for a non-profit organization called Apprisen.

college-financial-literacy-web-app.alt: College Financial Literacy Web App Logo
college-financial-literacy-web-app.title: College Financial Literacy Web App
college-financial-literacy-web-app.desc: During my winter break of my freshman year, I and another intern worked on a prototype web app that would give high school and early college students much needed financial literacy tools.

the-longevity-game.title: The Longevity Game
the-longevity-game.desc: Within Northwestern Mutual, I was a part of a team that recreated an old Flash game called The Longevity Game with modern web tools.

custom-implicit-bias-test.title: Custom Implicit Bias Test
custom-implicit-bias-test.desc: My team and I created an online survey about implicit racial and gender biases. We built and tracked the survey and its results using HTML, CSS, and PHP.

freesound-website-redesign.title: FreeSound Website Redesign
freesound-website-redesign.desc: I created a mockup of a redesign of a website I frequented called FreeSound and created a prototype with React.

university-of-wisconsin-arboretum-websit.title: University of Wisconsin-Arboretum Website Redesign
university-of-wisconsin-arboretum-websit.desc: I was in a team that redesigned the website used by the University of Wisconsin-Arboretum to be more useful to most users and to increase traffic and interactions.
